sentence: https://t.co/cDyejM3vG0 Ron DeSantis (@GovRonDeSantis) May 19, 2022 Within the last year, more than 107,000 people overdosed from drugs, 71,000 of those were caused by fentanyl.
author: Sarah Arnold
title: DeSantis Signs Bill Increasing Fentanyl Punishments, Blames Biden For Surge
